blocks.label:
import hashlib
import secrets
from typing import NamedTuple
class ApiKey(NamedTuple):
hash: str
def verify_api_key(provided_key: str, stored_hash: str) -> bool:
return hashlib.sha256(provided_key.encode()).hexdigest() == stored_hash
